name: Crucial T705 2TB
description: Flagship PCIe 5.0 SSD with massive heatsink and 14,500MB/s reads. Currently the fastest consumer SSD available for extreme workstation builds.

reviews.review_text: Fastest SSD I have ever tested. Numbers are insane.
Heatsink is massive but keeps it cool under load.
Premium price for premium speed. Worth it for pros.
